title: The default value in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description: Description: The default value set in the list box of a report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
OB: The default value in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
EB: After changing the Display type to Combo Box, the expected result is that "aaa" should be the default value. After completing step 5, the OK button should be grayed out.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the report parameter settings.
2. Modify the default value of the list box.
3. Save the changes.
4. Close the report parameter settings.
5. Reopen the report parameter settings.
6. Verify that the default value is not retained in the list box.
7. Verify that the OK button is still clickable.
